# Kernel { #jax_idem.IDEM.Kernel }

```python
IDEM.Kernel(self, function, basis=None, params=None, form='expansion')
```

Generic class defining a kernel, or a basis expansion of a kernel with
its parameters.

## Methods

| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [save_fig](#jax_idem.IDEM.Kernel.save_fig) | Saves a plot of the direction of the kernel. |
| [show_plot](#jax_idem.IDEM.Kernel.show_plot) | Shows a plot of the direction of the kernel. |

### save_fig { #jax_idem.IDEM.Kernel.save_fig }

```python
IDEM.Kernel.save_fig(name='kernel.png', width=5, height=4, dpi=300)
```

Saves a plot of the direction of the kernel.

### show_plot { #jax_idem.IDEM.Kernel.show_plot }

```python
IDEM.Kernel.show_plot(width=5, height=4)
```

Shows a plot of the direction of the kernel.
